subject: Request for sales cooperation
description_text: Dear Simsonn, We are following your established brand in the sim racing world with great interest. As the owner of the German manufacturer of sim racing hardware JKSIMTECH, I am writing to you today to learn about the requirements for a sales partnership. Our core business is the manufacture and sale of high-quality sim racing hardware. Our particular strength lies in the creation of customized custom-made products – from pedals and dashboards to complete rigs. And your products would complement our offerings well. Therefore, my question: Are you interested in a sales partnership? We are open to various collaboration models and would be happy to learn about the requirements and possibilities. You can find more information about us at www.jksimtech.de. Thank you for your time. We look forward to your positive feedback. Best regards from Germany, Jeremy kuss JKSIMTECH GbR Manufaktur für Simracing Hardware Hubertusstrasse 197 47798 Krefeld E-Mail:jksimtech@web.de

conversations.body_text: 你好，Jeremy Kuss，  当然，我会和我的团队讨论这个问题。与此同时，您能否分享一下您合作的品牌（或者您自己的品牌）在曝光度和销量方面的表现？
